description: ConfluentRolebinding is the Schema for the confluentrolebindings API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: ConfluentRolebindingSpec defines the desired state of ConfluentRolebinding

clustersScopeByIds.description: clustersScopeByIds specify the scope of the Confluent component cluster(s) via cluster id(s).

connectClusterId.description: connectClusterId specifies the Connect cluster id.

kafkaClusterId.description: kafkaClusterId specifies the id of the Kafka cluster id.

ksqlClusterId.description: ksqlClusterId specifies the ksqlDB cluster id.

schemaRegistryClusterId.description: schemaRegistryClusterId specifies the Schema Registry cluster id.

clustersScopeByRegistryName.description: clustersScopeByRegistryName specifies the unique cluster name you registered in the cluster registry.

name.description: Name is the name of the referenced CR

namespace.description: Namespace of the CR. Defaults to the current namespace of the CR making the reference

principal.description: RolebindingPrincipal defines the principal(user/group) the rolebinding belongs to.

name.description: name specifies the name of the principal.

type.description: type specifies the type of the principal. Valid options are `user` and `group`.

resourcePatterns.description: resourcePatterns specify the qualified resources associated with this rolebinding.

items.description: ResourcePattern specifies the qualified resource info associated with this rolebinding.

name.description: name specifies the name of the resource associated with this rolebinding.

patternType.description: patternType specifies the pattern of the resource. Valid options are `PREFIXED` or `LITERAL`. The default value is `LITERAL`.

resourceType.description: resourceType refers to the type of the resource. Valid options are `Topic`, `Group`, `Subject`, `KsqlCluster`, `Cluster`, `TransactionalId`, etc.

role.description: role specifies the name of the role.

status.description: ConfluentRolebindingStatus defines the observed state of ConfluentRolebinding

clusterRegistryName.description: clusterRegistryName is the cluster registry name the rolebinding associated with.

conditions.description: conditions specify the latest available observations of the current state.

items.description: Condition represents the latest available observations of the current state.

lastTransitionTime.description: lastTransitionTime shows the last time the condition was transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: lastUpdateTime shows the last time the condition was evaluated.

message.description: message shows a human-readable message with details about the transition.

reason.description: reason shows the reason for the last transition of the condition.

status.description: status shows the status of the condition, one of `True`, `False`, or `Unknown`.

kafkaClusterID.description: kafkaClusterID is the id of the Kafka cluster.

kafkaRestClass.description: kafkaRestClass is the kafkaRestClass this rolebinding uses. The format is: `<kafkaRestClass namespace>/<kafkaRestClass name>`.

observedGeneration.description: observedGeneration is the most recent generation observed for this app.

phase.description: phase describes the state of the Application resource.

principal.description: principal is the principal the rolebinding belongs to. The format is: `<principal type>:<principal name>`.

provisionToKafkaCluster.description: provisionToKafkaCluster is the Kafka cluster the rolebinding belongs to. The format is: `<Kafka namespace>/<Kafka name>`.

resourcePatterns.description: resourcePatterns are the resource patterns this rolebinding is associated with.

items.description: ResourcePattern specifies the qualified resource info associated with this rolebinding.

name.description: name specifies the name of the resource associated with this rolebinding.

patternType.description: patternType specifies the pattern of the resource. Valid options are `PREFIXED` or `LITERAL`. The default value is `LITERAL`.

resourceType.description: resourceType refers to the type of the resource. Valid options are `Topic`, `Group`, `Subject`, `KsqlCluster`, `Cluster`, `TransactionalId`, etc.

role.description: role is the role this rolebinding is associated with.

state.description: state is the state of the application
